column9: I have a long standing history battling my mental illnesses...I believe I am intelligent, articulate and I have a post-secondary education...I have great insight into anti-psychotics and other psychotropic drugs...this drug works well to address these issues but it is my personal experience that one should NEVER place a child on any type of psychotropic medicine...just because the Dr. says it's the right thing...you should not place absolute trust in your doctor...you need to do your homework and be responsible before just allowing a child to start on these powerful medications known to have many adverse side effects.
